name: Granulomatous Lymphocytic Interstitial Lung Disease (GLILD)
chief_complaint: I've been feeling short of breath and tired for months, and now I have a persistent cough.

lab_results.CT chest: diffuse ground-glass opacities with scattered nodules

prognosis: Variable; progressive in most cases but may stabilize with treatment. Increased risk of lymphoma development.
description: GLILD is a rare pulmonary complication of common variable immunodeficiency (CVID) characterized by granulomatous inflammation and lymphocytic infiltration of the lung parenchyma. It represents a complex interplay between immune dysregulation and chronic antigen stimulation.
